text: Pieter de Grebber (around 1600 â€“ 1652 or 1653 in Haarlem) was a Dutch painter. He was the oldest son of Frans Pietersz de Grebber. He learned how to paint from his father, and from Hendrik Goltzius. Category:1600s births Category:1650s deaths Category:Dutch painters
title: Pieter de Grebber
